fullplot: A recovering alcoholic and recently converted Mormon, Arthur "Killer" Kane, of the rock band The New York Dolls, is given a chance at reuniting with his band after 30 years.
plot: A recovering alcoholic and recently converted Mormon, Arthur "Killer" Kane, of the rock band The New York Dolls, is given a chance at reuniting with his band after 30 years.
title: New York Doll

tomatoes.consensus: Arthur Kane is a fascinating subject in what ultimately proves to be a touching, bittersweet documentary.
